Well in that case, you should probably still go with the 46. It has improved elbow articulation, and SH Figuarts style drop down legs. Plus, it's $10 cheaper I think.
It's also got a swap out Tony Stark head that the 45 doesn't have, the "broken heart" chest plate, swap out shoulder pieces, and swap out forearm pieces, and a ton of lights.
I think the 45 is sold out, so unless you wanna pay more than retail, get the 46, which should start shipping in the US by the end of June.
